summary: The diff shows a complete new application setup with TanStack Router configured to display HomePage at root ('/') and ProjectDetailsPage at '/project-details'. REQ-1 is fully implemented: the home page is set as the default route, the project page remains accessible via its specific route, and navigation between pages works correctly via Header component links.

hallucinated_features.description: Complete UI component library implementation including Header, Footer, and styling systems
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for routing configuration changes. The diff includes extensive new UI components (Header.tsx, Footer.tsx), global styling (index.css), Tailwind configuration, and complete page implementations that were not requested. The non-goals explicitly state 'Changing the content of either the home page or project page', yet both pages were created from scratch.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication hooks and infrastructure
hallucinated_features.reason: Authentication setup was not requested in the BuildRequest. The requirement was only to configure routing for the home page as default.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query setup and example query hooks
hallucinated_features.reason: Data fetching infrastructure was not requested. Only routing configuration was in scope.
